content.text:
# 2015 Ghana Movie Awards

The 2015 Ghana Movie Awards was held at the Accra International Conference Center on 30 December 2015.
Awards
This is a list of nominations. Winners were announced on 30 December 2015.
{| class=wikitable
|-
| valign="top" width="50%"|
